--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Dexter Allen <vector@a...> wrote:
.
> 
> As for a "medium-term" plan (any suggestions?), I'm roughly 
looking into 
> how to go from the current dumb "function-generator" to something 
that 
> can walk under noisy conditions, such as rough terrain, external 
forces, 
> imperfect actuators, etc.  (and so I've been following the recent 
noise 
> discussion with a lot of interest)
> 

How about walking towards a designated point that the user can 
specify?  

ken
